name: Tomb of Exxod
text: When this card is activated you can add 1 "Sphinx" card from your Deck to your hand. You can target 1 monster on the field; Switch the original ATK and DEF of that monster, then at the End Phase, change that monster to face-down Defense Position. (Quick Effect): You can change all face-down monsters on your side of the field to face-up Defense Position (this is treated as a Flip Summon). You can only use each effect of "Tomb of Exxod" once per turn.
